meanings.definition: A person who conforms to accepted behavior or standards.
meanings.sent1: She always follows the rules and is known as one of the conformers in our group.
meanings.sent2: The school uniform policy encourages students to be conformers.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the conformers all showed up dressed as superheroes.
meanings.sent4: In a world of rebels, she stood out as a shining example of a conformer.
meanings.sent5: The conformers in the office never miss a deadline, impressing their boss.

meanings.definition: Something that conforms to a particular shape or size.
meanings.sent1: The new sofa was a perfect conformer to the dimensions of the living room.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle piece was a great conformer, fitting seamlessly into the empty space.
meanings.sent3: The cookie cutter produced conformers in the shape of stars and hearts.
meanings.sent4: The key was a perfect conformer to the lock, opening it effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The mold created conformers of the original sculpture with precise detail.
